landing.hero.title: National Landfill Watch
landing.hero.description: A platform for monitoring landfills across Serbia using advanced satellite data. We analyze methane (CH₄) and carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions to support cleaner and sustainable communities.
landing.info.title: Sustainability Through Innovation
landing.info.card1.title: Real-Time Monitoring
landing.info.card1.text: Track methane and carbon dioxide levels from satellite sources.
landing.info.card2.title: AI-Driven Analysis
landing.info.card2.text: We use machine learning to detect changes in landfill activity.
landing.info.card3.title: Eco Responsibility
landing.info.card3.text: Our mission is to raise awareness and promote environmental transparency.
landing.info.card4.title: Collaboration & Education
landing.info.card4.text: We connect students, researchers, and NGOs to create impact together.
landing.info.card5.title: Data Transparency
landing.info.card5.text: Open access to landfill metrics enables citizens, scientists, and policymakers to act responsibly.
landing.info.card6.title: Smart Sustainability
landing.info.card6.text: We integrate modern technology to create long-term, data-driven environmental awareness.

faq.page.title: Find answers to all your questions
faq.page.description: Welcome to the National Landfill Watch help center. Here you can learn how to use our platform — from navigating the interactive map, exploring regional statistics, to reading the latest sustainability updates. Click on a question below to expand its answer.
faq.categories.map.title: Map Features
faq.categories.map.q1.question: How do I use the interactive map?
faq.categories.map.q1.answer: Use the region selector in the top-right corner to choose a part of Serbia. The map will automatically zoom to that area. Click on a landfill marker to view detailed information about it in a modal window.
faq.categories.map.q2.question: What does “View Region Report” do?
faq.categories.map.q2.answer: After selecting a region, you can click “View Region Report” to see analytics, emission data, and landfill insights for that area.
faq.categories.statistics.title: Statistics Page
faq.categories.statistics.q1.question: What can I find on the Statistics page?
faq.categories.statistics.q1.answer: You can explore interactive charts, see landfill distribution, and download environmental or emission reports for any region or the whole country.
faq.categories.statistics.q2.question: Can I export data?
faq.categories.statistics.q2.answer: Yes — you can download reports in several formats directly from the Statistics page.
faq.categories.info.title: Additional Information
faq.categories.info.q1.question: Who built the National Landfill Watch platform?
faq.categories.info.q1.answer: Our team of IT students and environmental enthusiasts designed and built the platform as part of a collaborative initiative to promote data-driven sustainability awareness. Learn more on the About Us page.
faq.categories.info.q2.question: Where can I find news or ESG-related content?
faq.categories.info.q2.answer: Visit the Blog section for updates, research insights, and ESG-related articles.
about.page.title: About Us
about.page.subtitle: Get to know the Envizor team
about.mission.title: Our Mission, Vision, and Values
about.mission.text: At Envizor, our mission is to bring environmental awareness closer to people through data-driven insights and technology. We believe in innovation, sustainability, and collaboration as the foundation for a cleaner and smarter future.
about.story.title: The Project Story
about.story.text: The National Landfill Watch project was created as part of a student competition among four teams. Our team, Envizor, combined a shared passion for environmental protection and software development to create a tool that visualizes landfill data across Serbia, providing insights into pollution and sustainability efforts.
